title: Sweet like honey
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FCW1qv

by Liasbtsaus

“He is really considering becoming a bad boy in order to catch Jimin’s attention, because he is convinced there’s no other way to do so.

“Thank you.” Jimin says, grabbing the yoghurt cups and smiling gently at Jeongguk.

Yeah, he is definitely going to do that if he can have that smile for himself.”

—

Jimin has always wanted to date a bad boy, so when Jeongguk hears him say it, he pretends to be one to catch his attention.

summary: BTS’s Music Featured In New Coca-Cola Ads Starring Park Bo Gum
title: BTS’s Music Featured In New Coca-Cola Ads Starring Park Bo Gum
body:
New Post has been published on http://www.btsvfan.com/btss-music-featured-in-new-coca-cola-ads-starring-park-bo-gum/

BTS’s Music Featured In New Coca-Cola Ads Starring Park Bo Gum

Coca-Cola has released new commercials featuring Park Bo Gum and BTS’s music!

On January 18, Coca-Cola released new commercials in which BTS’s song “Answer: Love Myself” from the group’s album “Love Yourself: Answer” plays in the background as Park Bo Gum goes on a trip to the beach with friends.

BTS’s music is shown again in the commercial as Park Bo Gum and other actors fly several kites featuring lyrics from the group’s songs and song titles. The phrases “RUN like yourself,” “Your Spring Day is today,” and “You’re my IDOL” are written on the kites. The commercial conveys a fresh message of having great hopes for the new year that matches well with BTS’s “Love Myself” theme.

At the end of the commercial, seven Coca-Cola bottles with BTS’s hit tracks written on the label are lined up in a row. These include phrases such as “If it’s you, I’m Fine,” “You’re my IDOL,” “RUN like yourself,” “This year is on FIRE,” “Just Go instead of worrying,” “You’re really DOPE,” and “Your Spring Day is today.”

Check out the clips below!

blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Sweet like honey
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FCW1qv

by Liasbtsaus

“He is really considering becoming a bad boy in order to catch Jimin’s attention, because he is convinced there’s no other way to do so.

“Thank you.” Jimin says, grabbing the yoghurt cups and smiling gently at Jeongguk.

Yeah, he is definitely going to do that if he can have that smile for himself.”

—

Jimin has always wanted to date a bad boy, so when Jeongguk hears him say it, he pretends to be one to catch his attention.

Words: 3114, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

title: G. C. F In Tokyo
body:
by chimsmoans

Jungkook has harbored feelings for Jimin for a while now. They take a trip to Tokyo and Jungkook feels like maybe Jimin feels the same way he does. But does he really?

title: Schism
body:
by Bright_Moon_Beam, orangenseok

The way he saw it, Min Yoongi had two options: stay in the confines—and admittedly, safety—of his bedroom like his parents and brother would want, continuing to observe the outside world like a bird in a cage, or finally work up the balls to disobey the rules his parents had set—rules that had become such a fundamental element of his being—sneak out of his proverbial cage, and spread his wings.

 
That window was the boundary between two worlds: the world of his home, safety—the only world he’d ever known—and the world of the outside, with its unpredictability, that he had always merely observed with a deep longing in his chest. Could he disobey the rules that had governed his life thus far and cross the unseen barrier?

He could.

Words: 6432, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Superhumans

title: Rain on me
body:
by yoonkooktrash1

“The thick color of a rainy day in Seoul
I still can’t fall asleep as I fade away
The rain stops and the reflection in the puddle
I see myself looking more miserable today”

BTS - Rain.

summary: BTS’ Suga And Epik High’s Tablo Collaborate With Lee Sora For Her New Single
title: BTS’ Suga And Epik High’s Tablo Collaborate With Lee Sora For Her New Single
body:
New Post has been published on http://www.btsvfan.com/bts-suga-and-epik-highs-tablo-collaborate-with-lee-sora-for-her-new-single/

BTS’ Suga And Epik High’s Tablo Collaborate With Lee Sora For Her New Single

Another great collaboration is coming our way!

On January 16, SPOTV reported that Lee Sora has collaborated with BTS’ Suga for her new single “Song Request” (literal translation) which is scheduled to drop on January 22.

In response, a representative of Lee Sora confirmed, “BTS’ Suga and Epik High’s Tablo collaborated with Lee Sora for her upcoming single ‘Song Request’ as a featured artist and a songwriter, respectively.”

This is Suga’s first time featuring in another artist’s track since his debut. The idol also wrote the lyrics for the rap, drawing much curiosity among fans about the chemistry between him and Lee Sora.

Epik High’s Tablo also took part in the track with lyrics and producing. Tablo and Lee Sora’s friendship began when Lee Sora featured in a track from Tablo’s first solo mini album in 2011. For the first time in eight years, the artists once again join forces.

Check out the music video teaser for “Song Request” below!
